article_title: Hospitals Pad Cash Cushion Thanks To Obamacare, Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.description: The U.S. hospital industry is back, thanks to the Affordable Care Act, with liquidity levels so improved these health facilities should weather coming shifts in government payments or employer moves to coordinate care toward outpatient services. A new report from Fitch Ratings shows the outlook for nonprofit hospitals, which make up [...]
